name: S13 Upgraded Combined Headwear
raw: ------------------------------ Ingredients ------------------------------ The Action Probability Estimator drops in Sector 13 and can be used for various tradeskill processes. #L "Action Probability Estimator" "257960" #L "Combined Commando's Headwear" "246658" #L "Combined Mercenary's Headwear" "246636" #L "Combined Officer's Headwear" "246670" #L "Combined Paramedic's Headwear" "246632" #L "Combined Scout's Headwear" "246682" #L "Combined Sharpshooter's Headwear" "246694" ------------------------------ Recipe ------------------------------ Action Probability Estimator + Combined Commando's Headwear = #L "Gannondorf's Combined Commando's Headwear" "257381" Note: Alien Armor headwear needs to be QL250+ Action Probability Estimator + Combined Mercenary's Headwear = #L "Sillum's Combined Mercenary's Headwear" "257380" Note: Alien Armor headwear needs to be QL250+ Action Probability Estimator + Combined Officer's Headwear = #L "Blackmane's Combined Officer's Headwear" "257383" Note: Alien Armor headwear needs to be QL250+ Action Probability Estimator + Combined Paramedic's Headwear = #L "Odum's Combined Paramedic's Headwear" "257377" Note: Alien Armor headwear needs to be QL250+ Action Probability Estimator + Combined Scout's Headwear = #L "Yakomo's Combined Scout's Headwear" "257382" Note: Alien Armor headwear needs to be QL250+ Action Probability Estimator + Combined Sharpshooter's Headwear = #L "Haitte's Combined Sharpshooter's Headwear" "257384" Note: Alien Armor headwear needs to be QL250+
